text: ivvaru, avan avviruvaraiyum emarri, avarkal (tankal nilaiyiliruntu) kile irankumpatic ceytan - avarkaliruvarum am'marattinai (am'marattin kaniyai)c cuvaittapotu - avarkalutaiya vetkattalankal avarkalukku veliyayirru avarkal cuvanapatiyin ilaikalal tankalai mutikkolla muyanranar; (appotu) avarkalai avarkal iraivan kuppittu; "unkaliruvaraiyum am'marattai vittum nan tatukkavillaiya? Niccayamaka saittan unkalukku pakirankamana pakaivan enru nan unkalukku collavillaiya?" Enru kettan
